__e: Today this man comes to me, Mack the Knife, as one friend to another.
Boys, meet my new partner in the act, Mighty Mack.
Have you by any chance heard a whisper about Mack the Knife?
If Mack's alive, there's still hope we can save him.
- Does that mean I can't go?
And my dad was very good at pool, but then Mack came along who was even probably better at pool.
